title: How to Make Brown Sugar Cookies

steps.headline: Add butter or margarine to mixing bowl.
Add brown sugar and egg to butter and beat until smooth.
Add vanilla, baking powder and salt.
Add flour slowly to the butter mixture.
Lightly dust a surface with flour.
Roll out cookie dough to 1/8-inch thick.
Cut out cookie dough using favorite cutters.
Place cut out cookie dough onto prepared baking sheets.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until cookies test done.
Cool cookies on wire baking racks.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Add butter or margarine to mixing bowl.  Add brown sugar and egg to butter and beat until smooth.  Add vanilla, baking powder and salt.  Beat.  Add flour slowly to the butter mixture.  Add spices if using.  Lightly dust a surface with flour.  Roll out cookie dough to 1/8-inch thick.  Cut out cookie dough using favorite cutters.  Grease baking sheets.  Place cut out cookie dough onto prepared baking sheets.  Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until cookies test done.  Cool cookies on wire baking racks.  Finished.
